Summary: We were not the only life forms watching the Musta
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were traveling south on hwy 522 just north of the New MexicoColorado border.The wild mustangs caught our attention, and we decided to pull over and snap apicture. When we got home we were reviewing our pictures from our trip when wenoticed an UFO in the picture. We all got very excited about it. I feel it is aspace craft not of this earth. I would like it analyzed to maybe determine whatthe atomic nature of it is.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Costilla
This sighting has never been favorited.
